FuncDef:
The emdi channel-group command creates an EMDI channel group or enters an EMDI channel group.
The undo emdi channel-group command deletes an EMDI channel group.
By default, no EMDI channel group is created.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an EMDI channel group.
The name is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Multicast channels to be detected need to be configured before the EMDI detection solution is used. Before configuring the channels to be detected, run the emdi channel-group command to create an EMDI channel group and then add the multicast channels to the channel group.
Follow-up Procedure
After an EMDI channel group is created or entered, run the emdi channel command to add multicast channels to the channel group.
Precautions
A maximum of 32 EMDI channel groups are supported.
